description: Grants the user the ability to make any part of their body explode without harming themselves. The user can even make their bodily secretions, such as breath and mucus, explosive.

users.circumstances: Already possessed the fruit when first introduced

abilityReveals.description: Can detonate any part of the body including limbs, creating powerful explosions without self-harm.
abilityReveals.firstUseContext: Mr. 5 demonstrates his explosive abilities upon arriving at Whisky Peak.

abilityReveals.description: User breathes into a gun's chambers to create invisible explosive air bullets that can be fired.
abilityReveals.firstUseContext: Mr. 5's signature technique using his flintlock revolver.

abilityReveals.description: User's breath, mucus, and other bodily emissions can be made explosive.
abilityReveals.firstUseContext: Revealed as part of Mr. 5's overall abilities.

weaknesses.weakness: Standard Devil Fruit weakness - inability to swim

strengths.description: User is immune to all explosion-based attacks, including their own and external explosives like cannonballs.
Can create explosions from any body part or secretion, making the user unpredictable in combat.

description: Grants the user the ability to freely change their body weight at will, ranging from 1 kilogram to 10,000 kilograms. This allows for both floating mobility and devastating crushing attacks.

users.circumstances: Already possessed the fruit when first introduced

abilityReveals.description: Can change body weight from as light as 1 kilogram to as heavy as 10,000 kilograms instantly.
abilityReveals.firstUseContext: Miss Valentine demonstrates her ability upon arriving at Whisky Peak.

abilityReveals.description: By reducing weight to 1 kilogram, can float through the air using a parasol.
abilityReveals.firstUseContext: Miss Valentine floats down using her parasol after arriving.

abilityReveals.description: Progressively increases weight while on top of an opponent to slowly crush them.
abilityReveals.firstUseContext: Described as one of Miss Valentine's torture techniques.

abilityReveals.description: Drops from the air and increases weight to maximum 10,000 kilograms for a devastating crushing attack.
abilityReveals.firstUseContext: Mentioned as Miss Valentine's ultimate attack.

weaknesses.weakness: Standard Devil Fruit weakness - inability to swim

weaknesses.description: When at minimum weight for floating, user is easily blown away by strong winds or attacks.

strengths.description: Can float and glide through the air, providing superior positioning in battle.
10,000 kilogram attacks can crush most opponents and structures.
Can use explosions to launch into the air while light, then become heavy for devastating drops.
